product_name: Topeak PanoBike Speed and Cadence Bike Sensor
long_description: A great alternative to a stand-alone GPS bike computer for owners of an iPhone 4S or 5, the Topeak PanoBike Speed and Cadence Bike Sensor transmits real-time ride data for analysis and sharing. All you need is the Topeak PanoBike app on your smartphone, which uses the iPhone's built-in GPS and accelerometers to trace your route and measure gradient and altitude. This accessory allows a very precise measurement of speed and cadence in real time, or it can record ride info without the phone present and sync with it later. Speed and Cadence Bike Sensor attaches easily on your chainstay or seatstay without scratching the finish. Bluetooth Smart algorithm extends battery time up to 1800 hrs. (5 years if you work out for 1 hr. per day) on the single included CR2032 battery. Optional accessories include the Topeak PanoBike Heart Rate Monitor and the Topeak PanoBike Mobile Power Pack, sold separately. Works with iPhone 4S/5 and iPod Touch with BLE 4.0.
